product_name: Lightspeed Outdoors 2-Person PVC-Free Air Bed - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Roomy enough for 2, this durable air bed is made from PVC-free thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU), making it more temperature stable, less stretchy, and more rugged than traditional PVC air beds.
short_description: Roomy enough for 2, this durable air bed is made from PVC-free thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU), making it more temperature stable, less stretchy, and more rugged than traditional PVC air beds.
